CustomField.label: Execute Initial LLM Call Synchronously
CustomField.description: When enabled, the first LLM call in a conversational turn will execute synchronously without queueable overhead for faster response times. Subsequent tool actions and follow-up LLM calls still execute asynchronously as needed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable for fast LLMs to get immediate responses (~2-5s improvement). Subject to synchronous limits (10s CPU, 6MB heap). Leave unchecked to use queueables with 60s CPU and 12MB heap limits.
